title: New publication: From Niche to Mainstream – Halal Goes Global (ITC - International Trade Centre) ...
text: ( Source : ITC - International Trade Centre ) Opportunities in the trillion-dollar global halal food market were featured at the World Export Development Forum (WEDF) which took place in Doha, Qatar from 20-21 October. The International Trade
